rooms.description: A minimalist design for the entrance area with a reception counter, shoe storage, and access to main living areas.
Spacious open-plan living room oriented towards the central courtyard and swimming pool view following Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Adjacent to the living area, designed with natural light in mind and minimalistic decor.
Functional minimalist kitchen with modern appliances, positioned near the service entrance for ease of use. Orientation ensures adherence to Vastu guidelines regarding cooking area placement.
Well-lit room oriented towards a positive cardinal direction as per Vastu, featuring an ensuite bathroom and closet space.
Comfortable guest bedroom located on the ground floor with access to common areas; positioned for optimal sunlight exposure.
Charming bedroom for children, designed with safety and ease of supervision in mind. Placement ensures minimal disruption from high-traffic areas.

openings.description: A grand entrance door aligning with the plot's frontal axis and designed to welcome positive energy in accordance with Vastu.
Provides access to the central courtyard ensuring natural ventilation and light.
Minimalistic windows placed to optimize natural lighting while maintaining privacy.

special_features.description: A large open space in the center of the ground floor that serves as a communal area, garden, and provides ample natural light to adjoining spaces.
An outdoor swimming pool designed with minimalist aesthetics and positioned to ensure privacy as per local building norms.
